description: Create and Delete Instances/Databases on Spanner.

instance_display_name.description: Name of Instance to display.  If not specified, instance_id will be used instead.

database_name.description: Name of database contained on the instance.

force_instance_delete.description: To delete an instance, this argument must exist and be true (along with state being equal to absent).

state.description: S t a t e   o f   t h e   i n s t a n c e   o r   d a t a b a s e   ( a b s e n t ,   p r e s e n t ) .   A p p l i e s   t o   t h e   m o s t   g r a n u l a r   r e s o u r c e .   I f   a   d a t a b a s e _ n a m e   i s   s p e c i f i e d   w e   r e m o v e   i t .     I f   o n l y   i n s t a n c e _ i d   i s   s p e c i f i e d ,   t h a t   i s   w h a t   i s   r e m o v e d .

node_count.description: Number of nodes in the instance.  If not specified while creating an instance, node_count will be set to 1.

configuration.description: Configuration the instance should use. Examples are us-central1, asia-east1 and europe-west1.
